name: The Golden Key
body: #The Golden Key ###First-person shooter created using Unity Engine. Roland Zeng ###About: Created over a course of 10 weeks as part of CS188 - 3D Real-Time Animation. Used the Unity C# scripting API to design character behavior, environment interaction, and enemy AI. ###Demo: Copy-paste the following into a non-Google Chrome browser such as IE or FireFox. Google Chrome does not support the Unity Web Player plugin: ``` http://rzeng95.github.io/SchoolProjects/CS188RTA/TheGoldenKey/TheGoldenKey.html ``` Or, if you are already using a non-Chrome browser, then click here! Or, you can download the Windows standalone build here!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
